column2: my life has changed!!! HALLELUJAH! This place is so great
column3: It is like a quick girl and the goat. One of the best things at girl and the goat is the Bread! i mean come onnnnn! their concoctions are so interesting and paired so well. This place SPECIALIZES in bread. I mean they got samples all over
column6: and it's only HALF done. anyway
